text:
"On the Floor" is a song recorded by American entertainer Jennifer Lopez. Rapper Pitbull is featured on the song. It was released on February 22, 2011, as the lead single from Lopez' seventh studio album, "Love?" It samples the song "Lambada" by Kaoma. "On the Floor" was later featured as the first track on Lopez' greatest-hits album, "Dance Again... the Hits".
The song has been very successful worldwide, reaching number one in over 13 countries, including Australia, Canada, Germany, New Zealand, and the UK. In the US, it reached the top three of the "Billboard" Hot 100. It was certified triple-platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America for sales of over three million copies in the US.
The music video for the song has received over 1.1 billion views and over three million likes as of February 2018.
